Paragraph: 2 Yet , the PCE of P3HT - based PSCs is limited by its relatively large bandgap ( ∼ 1.9 eV ) with major loss of the solar radiation as well as low open circuit - voltage ( V OC ≅ 0.6 V ) due to the relatively small energy difference between the highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) of P3HT and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) of PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

| PCBM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties and have been removed:

* HOMO (highest occupied molecular orbital)
* LUMO (lowest unoccupied molecular orbital)

These entities are related to the electronic structure of the materials, but they are not directly related to the material properties that are relevant to the performance of PSCs.
